label: 參勤交代
本: Edo and Paris:  Urban Life and the State in the Early Modern Era . Cornell University Press . 1994
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
説明文: The requirement that daimyo reside periodically in Edo (generally every other year) and that their legal wives, immediate heirs, and appropriate retinues of service personnel reside in the city at all times. [大名、江戸]
